content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ you asked for it and i m delivering the crochet knit purl free hat pattern after the viral tiktok video 1 i have had so many requests for this stitch in a pattern when i posted the video i already had patterns planned and had been enjoying this stitch for months i m excited for you to try this stitch it s very relaxing and rhythmic i find it so soothing to work up and i hope you experience the same a video tutorial is also provided for this pattern https //youtu be/ccobuuar29k 2 **crochet hook ** 5 0 mm h furls crochet hook 3 **notions ** removable stitch marker 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 pompom 7 or make your own pompom here https //brianakdesigns com/quick-faux-fur-pompom-tutorial/ 8 **yarn ** wecrochet swish 9 worsted weight 100% superwash merino wool 110 yds/100m 50g shown in copper & dove heather **yardage ** newborn 105 yds 1 skein baby 150 yds 2 skeins toddler 175 yds 2 skeins child/small adult 200 yds 2 skeins adult 250 yds 3 skeins **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain dss - double slip_stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet ssc - split single_crochet st s -stitch es **gauge** 16 sts by 18 row = 4x4 inches stitch pattern **measurements/sizes ** head circumference newborn 13-14 33-36 cm baby 16-17 41-43 cm toddler 18-19 46-48 cm child/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm **skill level ** easy/beginner the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www brianakdesigns com/ 10 let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 11 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 12 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 13 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 14 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 15 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 16 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns #wecaugust21 #furlsinf821 it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item 1 https //www tiktok com/@brianakdesigns/video/7010205370253577478 lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1 2 https //youtu be/ccobuuar29k 3 https //furlscrochet com/products/furls-streamline-ergonomic-crochet-hooks-swirl#oid=1069 4
